question.questionText: Explain why you got a voltage reading of 1.5 for terminal 3 and the positive terminal.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Terminal 3 and the positive terminal are separated by the gap
Terminal 3 and the positive terminal are not connected
terminal 3 is connected to the negative battery terminal
terminal 3 is not separated from the negative battery terminal
Terminal 3 and the positive battery terminal are in different electrical states

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: there is still the same gap
seperated by a gap in terminal 3
